comment: great professor.  encourages independent thinking and risk taking.  i feel like im a better artist after taking this class.
Easily one of KSU's best. Very understanding, helpful, and caring towards his students!
Good teacher.  Expects substantial participation and is accomodating if you are a hard worker.  Easy grade if you put in the ti me.  Quizes are simple and projects are fun.

Had him for 3d art and got an A but it was so awful to be in his class I would NEVER take him again. He should not teach 3d. the projects were lame and with little creativity or inspiration involved. He's attractive but that all goes away when he starts talking. He makes a better artist then teacher. Dry humor was ok but then he makes it annoying.
every once a week we had a quiz, 5questions that are from each chapter form the text book. not too hard, but needs study.  He has a dry sense of humor, could be cold.
